00937                 G4double phi_out = phi_in + traveled_dphi;
00938 
00939                 //=>Step 4, get parameters of the function for distance
00940                 //d(D^2/r^2)/d(phi)) = a[0] + a[1]*sin(2*phi) + a[2]*sin(phi) + a[3]*cos(phi) + a[4]*phi*cos(phi) + a[5]*phi
00941                 G4double x0 = pointIn_pos.x()/r_helix;
00942                 G4double y0 = pointIn_pos.y()/r_helix;
00943                 G4double z0 = pointIn_pos.z()/r_helix;
00944                 G4double k = l_helix/r_helix;
00945                 G4double cosPhi = cos(phi_in);
00946                 G4double sinPhi = sin(phi_in);
00947                 G4double sinTheta = sin(theta_helix);
00948                 G4double cosTheta = cos(theta_helix);
00949                 G4double A = x0- cosPhi;
00950                 G4double B = y0- sinPhi*cosTheta - k*phi_in*sinTheta;
00951                 G4double a[6];
00952                 a[0] = B*k*sinTheta;
00953                 a[1] = -sinTheta*sinTheta/2;
00954                 a[2] = k*sinTheta*cosTheta-A;
00955                 a[3] = B;
00956                 a[4] = k*sinTheta*cosTheta;
00957                 a[5] = k*k*sinTheta*sinTheta;
00958                 G4double phi_left, phi_right;
00959                 if ( traveled_dphi > 0 ){
00960                         phi_left = phi_in;
00961                         phi_right = phi_out;
00962                 }
00963                 else{
00964                         phi_left = phi_out;
00965                         phi_right = phi_in;
00966                 }
00967 
00968                 //=>Step 5, find phi
00969                 //About type:
00970                 //0: f'>=0 && f''<0;
00971                 //1: f'<0 && f''<=0;
00972                 //2: f'<0 && f''>=0;
00973                 //3: f'>=0 && f''>0;
00975                 //ATTENTION!!! This method will fail if there are more than 4 segments(devided according to types) in this step
00976                 int type_left = check_type(a,phi_left);
00977                 int type_right = check_type(a,phi_right);
00978                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00979                         std::cout<<"    type_left = "<<type_left<<", type_right == "<<type_right<<std::endl;
00980                 }
00981                 G4int nTry_max = 100;
00982                 double error = 0;
00983                 G4double root_left = NewtonRootFinding(a,phi_left,nTry_max,fTolerance,error);
00984                 if (error_max<fabs(error)) error_max = fabs(error);
00985                 G4double root_right = NewtonRootFinding(a,phi_right,nTry_max,fTolerance,error);
00986                 if (error_max<fabs(error)) error_max = fabs(error);
00987                 G4double b[4];
00988                 b[0] = theta_helix;
00989                 b[1] = k;
00990                 b[2] = A;
00991                 b[3] = B;
00992                 G4double dist2_left = calculateDist2(b,phi_left);
00993                 G4double dist2_right = calculateDist2(b,phi_right);
00994                 G4double phi;
00995                 if ( (type_left == type_right && type_right <= 1 && root_left != root_right) || (type_left == 1 && type_right == 0) ){
00996                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00997                                 std::cout<<"    =>Need to find minimum value"<<std::endl;
00998                         }
00999                         //half finding
01000                         G4double left = root_left;
01001                         G4double right = root_right;
01002                         G4double mid;
01003                         int iTry = 0;
01004                         while (1){
01005                                 mid = ( left + right )/2;
01006                                 int type = check_type(a,mid);
01007                                 if ( type == 1 || type == 2 ) break;
01008                                 else if (type == 0) right = mid;
01009                                 else left = mid;
01010                                 if ( iTry++ >= nTry_max ){
01011                                         //std::cout<<"WARNING: in CdcCellSD::FindClosestPoint(), iTry reached maximum limit "<<iTry<<std::endl;
01012                                         break;
01013                                 }
01014                         }
01015                         if (nTry<iTry) nTry = iTry;
01016                         G4double root_mid = NewtonRootFinding(a,mid,nTry_max,fTolerance,error);
01017                         if (error_max<fabs(error)) error_max = fabs(error);
01018                         G4double dist2_root = calculateDist2(b,root_mid);
01019                         int index = findSmallest(dist2_left, dist2_right, dist2_root);
01020                         if ( index == 0 ) phi = phi_left;
01021                         else if ( index == 1 ) phi = phi_right;
01022                         else phi = root_mid;
01023                 }
01024                 else if( (type_left <= 2 && type_right == 3) ||
01025                                 (type_left == type_right && type_right == 2 && root_left != root_right) ||
01026                                 (type_left == type_right && type_right == 3 && root_left != root_right) ||
01027                                 (type_left == 2 && type_right <= 1) ){
01028                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
01029                                 std::cout<<"    =>Got minimum value"<<std::endl;
01030                         }
01031                         G4double dist2_root = calculateDist2(b,root_right);
01032                         int index = findSmallest(dist2_left, dist2_right, dist2_root);
01033                         if ( index == 0 ) phi = phi_left;
01034                         else if ( index == 1 ) phi = phi_right;
01035                         else phi = root_right;
01036                 }
01037                 else {
01038                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
01039                                 std::cout<<"    =>Don't need minimum value"<<std::endl;
01040                         }
01041                         phi = (dist2_left < dist2_right ? phi_left : phi_right);
01042                 }
01043 
01044                 //=>Step 6, get the point
01045                 G4double X = r_helix * ( cos(phi) + A );
01046                 G4double Y = r_helix * ( sin(phi)*cosTheta + k*phi*sinTheta + B );
01047                 G4double Z = r_helix * ( k*phi*cosTheta - sin(phi)*sinTheta - k*phi_in*cosTheta + z0 + sinPhi*sinTheta );
01048                 closestPoint_pos.setX(X);
01049                 closestPoint_pos.setY(Y);
01050                 closestPoint_pos.setZ(Z);
01051 
01052                 //=>Step 7, transform it back to lab coordinate system
01053                 driftD = closestPoint_pos.rho();
01054                 closestPoint_pos += vec4move;
01055                 closestPoint_pos.rotate(z_axis, -theta4rotate_y);
01056                 closestPoint_pos.rotate(axis4rotate_z, -theta4rotate_z);
01057 
01058                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
01059                         std::cout<<"    traveled_dphi = "<<traveled_dphi/deg
01060                                 <<"deg, phi_in = "<<phi_in/deg
01061                                 <<"deg, phi_out = "<<phi_out/deg
01062                                 <<"deg, phi = "<<phi/deg
01063                                 <<"deg"<<std::endl;
01064                 }
01065         }
01066         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
01067                 std::cout<<"  closestPoint_pos(rho,phi,z):"<<closestPoint_pos.rho()/cm<<"cm, "<<closestPoint_pos.phi()/deg<<"deg, "<<closestPoint_pos.z()/cm<<"cm, driftD = "<<driftD/cm<<"cm"<<std::endl;
01068         }
01069         return 0;
01070 }

00636                                      <<"ns"
00637                                      <<std::endl;
00638                 }
00639 //              if (driftD < preDriftD) {
00640                 if (driftT < preDriftT) {
00641                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){

00643                         }
00644                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetTrackID(trackID);
00645                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetDriftD(driftD);
00646                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetDriftT(driftT);

00649                         (*hitsCollection)[pointer]->SetTheta(theta);

00652                         //Set for root objects
00653                         if(flag_x) m_x[pointer] = hitPosition.x()/unit_x;
00654                         if(flag_y) m_y[pointer] = hitPosition.y()/unit_y;
00655                         if(flag_z) m_z[pointer] = hitPosition.z()/unit_z;

00661                         if(flag_pOz) m_pOz[pointer] = pointOut_pos.z()/unit_pOz;
00662                         if(flag_t) m_t[pointer] = globalT/unit_t;

00664                         if(flag_py) m_py[pointer] = pointIn_mom.y()/unit_py;
00665                         if(flag_pz) m_pz[pointer] = pointIn_mom.z()/unit_pz;
00666                         if(flag_e) m_e[pointer] = total_e/unit_e;
00667                         if(flag_e) m_ekin[pointer] = ekin/unit_ekin;
00668                         if(flag_stepL) m_stepL[pointer] += stepL/unit_stepL;
00669                         if(flag_nTry) m_nTry[pointer] = nTry;
00670                         if(flag_status) m_status[pointer] = status;
00671                         if(flag_error) m_error[pointer] = error;
00672                         if(flag_driftD_smeared) m_driftD_smeared[pointer] = driftD_smeared/unit_driftD_smeared;
00673                         if(flag_driftD) m_driftD[pointer] = driftD/unit_driftD;
00674                         if(flag_layerID) m_layerID[pointer] = layerId;
00675                         if(flag_cellID) m_cellID[pointer] = cellId;
00676                         if(flag_tid) m_tid[pointer] = trackID;
00677                         if(flag_pid) m_pid[pointer] = pid;
00678                 }
00679         }
00680         return true;
00681 }
